name: The Dark Castle
description:
The story

Up on the mountain rests a castle, bone-white, but with a dark soul.

The Lord who resides there rules over all these lands, and has done so for ages.

No one would voluntarily go there, except for you...

The rules
  • If one of your attributes ever reaches four marks, a very unfortunate fate will befall you.
  • There are 18 ways to finish the Dark Castle, find them all!
  •  WARNING: some mature themes included!

94 screens, 18 endings, 225 choices, 4785 words
